channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Perverse Microsheaves
item.description: arXiv:2209.12998v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: On a complex contact manifold, or complex symplectic manifold with weight-1 circle action, we construct a sheaf of stable categories carrying a t-structure which is locally equivalent to a microlocalization of the perverse t-structure.
item.dc:creator: Laurent C\^ot\'e, Christopher Kuo, David Nadler, Vivek Shende

item.title: The Path-product in Morse Homology with differential graded coefficients
item.description: arXiv:2508.09583v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We will use the tools developed in [Rie24] to give a Morse-theoretic description of a string topology product on the homology of the space of paths in a manifold Y with endpoints in a submanifold X and a module structure on this homology over the Chas-Sullivan ring of Y . These operations have been defined and studied by Stegemeyer in [Ste25] in singular homology.
item.dc:creator: Robin Riegel (IRMA)
